msbt.message: You hear that Tom Nook's doing DIY demo sessions over at his place, ?I went by and he helped me make some tools out of stuff we found around the island.They're kinda subparbut the demo gave me a ton of ideas for some workout gear I can build.I bet you could make a lot of really sweet stuff with DIY. The demo is free too. Go talk to Tom Nook!

Um I thought I'd be able to just wing it, and then kinda sorta moved here without a Bell to my name.So now I'm trying to set up my routine and, wellbottom line is, I'm ultra broke.Hmm I could do some weeding, or pick stuff up and sell it to Timmy. That might help,

Someone said we could set our furniture up anywhere we like. Oh, except for in the plaza!I'm thinking of putting together an outdoor gym. Whaddaya think?If you've got an idea you think will get everyone pumped, don't hold back, !

By the way, Timmy said if you run out of something you need, swing by his place and he can sell you more.Say what you like, but this island life package deal thing's got some really solid support, !Still, I'm kinda broke right now, so I'll probably be selling more stuff to Timmy than I'll be buying
